Portfolio / Aquafina
FMCG 2024

Aquafina Water It's Time for Water

It's time for: Happiness. Beauty. Health. Fitness.

Scroll to explore

Client

Aquafina

Industry

FMCG

Services

Awareness Campaign, Low Sodium Messaging

Year

2024

Project Overview

A soft-toned, emotionally driven awareness campaign designed to shift perception from 'just another bottle of water' to a purposeful lifestyle enhancer.

The Challenge

01

The challenge was to differentiate Aquafina in a saturated market of bottled water. The campaign needed to create a unique emotional connection with consumers and highlight a key product benefit (low sodium) in a compelling way.

The Creative Solution

02

The solution was a minimal yet vibrant visual identity where each theme tied hydration to personal wellness benefits.

The campaign used different color palettes and visual motifs for Happiness, Beauty, Health, and Fitness, positioning Aquafina as a smarter choice for conscious consumers seeking balance and simplicity.

Aquafina Water Awareness Campaign
